name: McCormick Parsley Flakes, 0.25 Oz
short_description: New look, same great McCormick Parsley Flakes
McCormick Parsley Flakes bring mild, herby flavor
We dry fresh parsley leaves within hours of harvest for best flavor
Attractive green color makes it an ideal garnish for almost any dish
Mild flavor does not overpower the taste of chicken, seafood or meatloaf
product_description: McCormick Parsley Flakes bring mild, herby flavor and bright color to everyday dishes and holiday fare. Our Parsley Flakes are dried within hours of harvest so they retain their characteristic flavor and green color. What dish wouldn’t benefit from a shake of dried parsley? It lends the perfect sprinkle of color to everything from scrambled and deviled eggs to onion soup, veggies, potatoes and noodles. In addition to its use as a garnish, parsley also offers mild, herby flavor that doesn’t overpower the taste of chicken, seafood, meatballs or meatloaf. Add our parsley to garlic bread, salad dressings, marinades, dips, breading mixes, and herbed butters & sauces. Use 1 tsp. Parsley Flakes in place of 1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley.

name: Shrida Foods Dried parsley Flakes, 13oz | Premium Quality Parsley for Cooking & Seasoning | Gluten-Free, Non-GMO | Indian Parsley for Soups, Salads, Marinades & More
short_description: Premium Quality Dried Parsley Flakes: Shrida Foods offers 100% natural, handpicked parsley flakes, dried to preserve their vibrant color, fresh flavor, and aromatic qualities. The perfect seasoning for a variety of dishes.

Ideal for Soups, Salads & Marinades: This versatile parsley is ideal for enhancing the flavor of soups, stews, salads, marinades, sauces, and seasoning blends. Add a fresh, herbal touch to your everyday meals.
Gluten-Free & Non-GMO: Our parsley flakes are naturally gluten-free and non-GMO, ensuring that every serving is pure and safe for those with dietary restrictions or preferences.

Authentic Indian Parsley: Sourced from trusted farms in India, our parsley leaves are hand-harvested to ensure only the finest, most aromatic parsley is included in each package, delivering an authentic taste of Indian-grown herbs.

Rich in Flavor & Nutrients: Dried parsley retains its rich, herbal flavor and is packed with essential vitamins and antioxidants. It’s a healthy and flavorful addition to your cooking, providing a burst of freshness with every sprinkle.

Resealable Packaging for Freshness: Each 12oz package of parsley flakes is carefully sealed to preserve freshness and aroma. The resealable bag ensures long-lasting quality, so you can use it whenever you need that perfect herbal kick in your dishes.
product_description: Shrida Foods Dried Parsley Flakes (12oz) are a premium-quality herb that will bring freshness and flavor to your cooking. Carefully handpicked and dried to preserve their natural aroma, these parsley flakes add a fragrant, herbal kick to a wide variety of dishes. Whether you’re adding it to soups, stews, marinades, sauces, or salads, this versatile herb enhances your recipes with a burst of green flavor. Sourced from trusted farms in India, this authentic Indian parsley is 100% natural, non-GMO, and gluten-free, making it an excellent choice for those with dietary restrictions. With no preservatives or additives, you can trust that every sprinkle of parsley is packed with nutrients and rich flavor. The resealable packaging ensures that your parsley remains fresh and aromatic, ready to elevate every meal. Whether you’re cooking traditional Indian dishes or experimenting with Mediterranean-inspired recipes, Shrida Foods Dried Parsley Flakes are the perfect addition to your pantry.

short_description: ✔Premium Quality: Each delicate parsley flake, carefully freeze-dried to preserve its vibrant green color and fresh aroma.At the same weight, the volume of freeze-dried parsley flakes is about twice that of heat-dried parsley flakes.
